    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable

    public class Block
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
    A class of game blocks with numbers. Must works with GameBoard
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    pixel-pixel
    See Also:
    GameBoard
